reviewText:
This is one of the better Playboy videos out there, but I have to say I almost regret buying the VHS because I just found out that all of this content (as well as the similar one for Playmates of The 90s) is included as a bonus disc of the Playboy: 50 Years of Playmates collection on DVD.  These Playmate features are pretty nice, and some of the more explicit footage I've seen (the ladies aren't as coy with their knees glued together all the time), it's just that VHS really looks awful today given the availability of DVD quality, let alone Blu-ray.

That said, the features here particularly for India Allen, Barbara Edwards, Shannon Tweed and others are outstanding.  I can't wait to see how good they look at "full quality" (DVD).  Lots of open leg shots and I'm pretty sure labia will be visible... even on VHS they occasionally show.  And of course, it's not only the explicit degree of the footage that makes it exciting, it's when the production is this good and the women are this gorgeous, AND they happen to let you see a lot of very brazen nudity, now THAT is a winning combination.

Playboy / Playmates of the Year: The 80's fifty-six minutes long and was released on video on November 19, 1991. Unlike the video calendars, this is sexier. This is basically Playmates of the Year in the 80's decade. At the end of the video, it tells you what has since happen to the Playmates. In order of the video here are the following Playmates and my comments on each one.

India Allen\Playmate of the Year in 1988-India is nude at least 80% of the time in her video scene. India is completely nude 100% of the time in the Chair, Night, and Bathroom segment. In the Gym segment, India is nude only 50% of the time and in the Bedroom segment Indian is completely nude 90% of the time.

Terri Welles\Playmate of the Year in 1981-Terri show full nudity in 80% of her pictorial and is nude only 70% of the time in her photo shoots.

Barbara Edwards\Playmate of the Year in 1984-Barbara is nude 80% of the time in her pictorials and 85% in her Bed segment.

Kathy Shower\Playmate of the Year in 1986-Kathy is only fully nude 20% of the time in her Dance segment and 100% of the time in segment two. Kathy shows 100% of full nudity in her pictorial.

Donna Edmondson\Playmate of the Year in 1987-Over all Donna is nude only 70% of the time in her scene. In the Jumping segment there is no nudity. However in the Couch and Shower segment she is completely nude 100% of the time. Donna strips down to full nudity in the House segment.

Dorothy Stratten\Playmate of the Year in 1980-Dorothy is just topless in her photo shoot and the only nudity is in the bathtub, but she is cover by bubbles.

Marianne Gravatte\Playmate of the Year in 1983-Marianne shows 100% of full nudity in her pictorials, but in her photo shoot there is some skin and no nudity.

Shannon Tweed\Playmate of the Year in 1982-Shannon is completely nude 55% of the time in her scene.

Karen Velez\Playmate of the Year in 1985-Karen is 100% nude in the beach segment while in the Outdoor Gardens segment there is only partial nudity.

Kimberly Conrad\Playmate of the Year in 1989-Kimberly is only fully nude in the Bathtub segment. Kimberly keeps her clothes on 95% during her air time.

Overall this is a much better quality of video. Playboy / Playmates of the Year: The 80's get a B+.
